summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Section 78A.106 and Subsections (a)1, (a)2, and (a)5 of Section 78A.103 and repealing Section 78A.107 and subsection (a) of Section 78A.105 of the Seattle Fire Code to prohibit the sale, possession, or use of fireworks in Seattle, except for public display and ceremonial purposes under permit.
